subject: Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show
Dogs
lead_paragraph: Uno, the 15-inch beagle, vindicated the extraordinary adoration that enveloped him at Madison Square Garden and became the first beagle to win best in show at Westminster.
snippet: Uno, the 15-inch beagle, vindicated the extraordinary adoration that enveloped him at Madison Square Garden and became the first beagle to win best in show at Westminster.
